title: And Then There Was You
lyrics:
And then there was you
And then there was you, my dear
I thought love was a game
One would win or would lose until
I found you
Until I found you, my dear
I thought love was a shame
So I threw it away
And then there was you
I thought I was right
But now it seems I was wrong
I just waited so long
And I feared love had gone
And then there was you
